title: Bylaws
context: PART V. CONDOMINIUM MANAGEMENT Note This part, referenced as repealed in the main volume, was reenacted by L 2007, c 244, pt of ยง2. Source notes for the sections in this part begin with L 2007, c 244. Cross References Association documents to be provided, see ยง514B-154.5. ยง514A-81 Bylaws. The operation of the property shall be governed by bylaws, a true copy of which shall be recorded in the same manner as the declaration. No amendment to the bylaws is valid unless the amendment is duly recorded. [L 2007, c 244, pt of ยง2]
